selections.name: Jacaranda
selections.reason: Drops significantly in class after contesting a $2M race at Randwick. Won well on debut and drawn perfectly in barrier 2.

selections.name: La Gitana
selections.reason: Solid performance in a $200k race at Caulfield last start. Brings strong form lines.

selections.name: Gin Twist
selections.reason: Consistent performer with placings in both career starts. Will be competitive.

selections.name: Nikitria
selections.reason: Expensive purchase ($550k) on debut. Watch betting moves closely.

danger_horse.name: La Gitana
danger_horse.reason: Has the exposed form to challenge if the favorite underperforms.

selections.name: Rue De Royale
selections.reason: Class runner of the field. Finished 2nd in BM90 grade last start, drops to BM78 here. Top weight is the only concern.

selections.name: Behaviour
selections.reason: Finished 3rd behind Rue De Royale last start and meets him better at the weights. Solid each-way hope.

selections.name: Flying Mikki
selections.reason: Consistent type who was runner-up last start. Always around the mark.

selections.name: Legacy Bay
selections.reason: Drawn well and has been consistent in this grade.

danger_horse.name: Behaviour
danger_horse.reason: Weight swing in his favor vs the top pick.

selections.name: Watersports
selections.reason: Coming off a win and drops in weight rising in class. Looks well-placed to repeat.

selections.name: Great Maximus
selections.reason: Consistent performer who rarely runs a bad race. Barrier 4 gives him a great run.

selections.name: Bons To Riches
selections.reason: Runner-up last start and holds solid form for this grade.

selections.name: Inexorable
selections.reason: Drawn well and can improve on recent efforts.

danger_horse.name: Great Maximus
danger_horse.reason: Class factor and consistency make him a threat.

selections.name: Ahha Ahha
selections.reason: Finished 2nd to Sneaky Sunrise last start but gets a significant weight swing (7lb) in his favor. Drawn to get the perfect run.

selections.name: Sneaky Sunrise
selections.reason: Winner of the key form reference race. Hard to knock winning form but rises in weight.

selections.name: Hot Digity Boom
selections.reason: Last start winner stepping up in class. Drawn well.

selections.name: Astral Flame
selections.reason: Another last start winner drawn the inside. Must be respected.

selections.name: Celui
selections.reason: Coming off a strong win in BM94 grade in Sydney. The clear class runner of the field.

selections.name: Bridal Waltz
selections.reason: Resuming. Has a good fresh record and drawn the rail.

selections.name: Midwest
selections.reason: Speed machine who will look to lead. Will give a sight for a long way.

selections.name: Perilous Fighter
selections.reason: Last start winner down in the weights.

danger_horse.name: Bridal Waltz
danger_horse.reason: Quality mare who could sprint well fresh.

selections.name: Bel Merci
selections.reason: Placed 3rd in a strong race last start. Has the class edge over this field.

selections.name: Educated
selections.reason: Unbeaten in two starts. Drawn the rail and looks a progressive type.

selections.name: Wintery
selections.reason: Runner-up to a smart one (Alpha Sofie) last start. That form reads well.

selections.name: Headbanger
selections.reason: Dominant maiden winner last time out.

selections.name: Holymanz
selections.reason: Consistent type who ran 3rd in a strong race last start. Drawn to get a soft run.

selections.name: Birdman
selections.reason: Ran 4th over 1400m last start. The step up to the mile is ideal.

selections.name: Enxuto
selections.reason: Finished alongside Holymanz last start. Honest competitor.

selections.name: Apulia
selections.reason: Quality stayer resuming/freshened. Won well last start but might need further.

danger_horse.name: Birdman
danger_horse.reason: Improvement expected stepping up in trip.

selections.name: Observer
selections.reason: Dominant winner of the lead-up race. The clear horse to beat in the Guineas.

selections.name: Sixties
selections.reason: Won the other key lead-up race. The main danger.

selections.name: Planet Red
selections.reason: Runner-up to Observer last time. Honest but needs to find a length.

selections.name: West Of Swindon
selections.reason: Better than raw form suggests. Can run a race at odds.

selections.name: Alpha Sofie
selections.reason: Impressive last start winner. Beat Wintery who runs in Race 6. Strong form line.

selections.name: Nashville Jack
selections.reason: Runner-up in a rich race last start. Class factor.

selections.name: Trapper John
selections.reason: Last start winner with upside.

selections.name: La Astro Chat
selections.reason: Another last start winner in a race with plenty of depth.

selections.name: Ambassadorial
selections.reason: Won well over this distance range last start. Maintains form.

selections.name: Xtra Rush
selections.reason: Last start winner who makes his own luck. 2000m should suit.

selections.name: Fiorenot
selections.reason: Runner-up to the scratched Tarvue last start. That form line is strong here.

selections.name: Regal Lion
selections.reason: Ran a solid 3rd last start. Stays well.

danger_horse.name: Xtra Rush
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is hard to ignore.
